text: [Ej mu'minon] Hangome ki ozim [-i Xajʙar va] ʙa giriftani ƣanimat mesaved, mutaxallifon [az safari Makka] xohand guft: «Icozat dihed, mo niz ʙa dunʙoli sumo ʙijoem». Onon mexohand, kalomi ilohiro taƣjir dihand. [Ej Pajomʙar] Ba eson ʙigu: «Sumo hargiz ʙa dunʙoli mo naxohed omad [zero in ƣanimatho maxsusi kasone ast, ki dar Hudajʙija huzur dostand va dar ʙorai in hukm] Alloh taolo qaʙlan cunin farmudaast»; on goh xohand guft: «[Na] Balki sumo nisʙat ʙa mo hasad mevarzed». [Hargiz cunin nest] Balki cuz iddai kame [az onon avomiri ilohiro] darnamejoʙand
